desc: We are a Jewelry store located in Brickell Miami. Inside Mary Brickell Village on south Miami ave we specialize in custom made jewelry and jewelry design. Our luxury store has Gold , Diamonds and silver. Jewelry repair is available in house. Weddings rings to mens jewelry. Diamond earrings and designer leather luggage

layout.text: In Mary Brickell Village, the ultra-clean and refined jeweler has launched his second store
